      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImmutableThemedTextGraphics ImmutableThemedTextGraphics.withTheme(Theme theme)

      Constructors in com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics with parameters of type Theme 
      Constructor and Description
      ImmutableThemedTextGraphics(TextGraphics backend, Theme theme)
      Creates a new ImmutableThemedTextGraphics with a specified backend for all drawing operations and a theme.
